title: Mathematics Enrichment Learning Project Through Intentional Content Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary algebra, statistics, and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen the capacity of medical, legal, and technical professionals to apply mathematics to real job-related problems; smartphones are mandatory equipment while PC use is limited

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex math problems arising in real workplace scenarios using structured approaches
Learners can deeply understand mathematical concepts and apply them to diverse societal contexts (medical data analysis, legal probability calculations, technical design optimization, etc.)
Learners can design learning content that enables conceptual integration rather than superficial understanding through peer feedback and iterative practice.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
